name: Action Bowling HD
description:
The best and most popular bowling game on the iPhone is now available on the iPad in HD featuring all new bowling mechanics which makes the game even more fun, realistic and addictive!

The original Action Bowling for the iPhone and iPod Touch has over 12 million units downloaded worldwide!!

Features:

• New intuitive bowling mechanics redesigned from the ground up to take advantage of the iPad format
• All new in-game menu system which allows the player to switch custom balls and bowling alleys on the fly
• 6 additional custom bowling balls making a total of 18 balls to choose from
• 12 stunning 3D bowling locations remade in HD for the iPad
• Re-tuned User Interface allowing for quicker access to new games and other functions
• Realistic sound effects
• Full iTunes music support. Listen to single track or entire playlist from your iTunes library while bowling
• State-of-the-art 3D physics engine for realistic pin action
• Multiplayer mode allowing you to challenge up to 3 additional players
• Practice mode allowing the user to set up a custom rack
• Bowling Trivia Game with 165 questions
• Openfeint, Facebook and Twitter integration
• Detail stats tracking
